body_html:
(Response to the glibc part of the previous comment)
Based on our experience with x86, there is no straightforward way to do it.
You can statically link glibc and libstdcxx into your binary, but that can cause other problems.
This is why we still build our binaries on ubuntu 14.

body:
(Response to the glibc part of the previous comment)
Based on our experience with x86, there is no straightforward way to do it.
You can statically link glibc and libstdcxx into your binary, but that can cause other problems.
This is why we still build our binaries on ubuntu 14.
